data.name: TXT_INSTALL_ADDONLIB
data.value: Install addon library...

data.name: TXT_INSTALLADDONFILTER
data.value: OPMedia Addon Libraries (*.dll)|*.dll||

data.name: TXT_INSTALLADDONS
data.value: Select an OPMedia addon library to install:

data.name: TXT_INVALID_ADDON
data.value:
The DLL file you have selected is not a valid OPMedia extension library.
Note: If you believe, however, that the respective file should have been a valid extension, you are advised to contact the producer or the supplier of this DLL.

data.name: TXT_ADDON_NAME
data.value: Addon Name

data.name: TXT_ADDON_SETTINGS
data.value: Addon Settings

data.name: TXT_ADDONS_CHANGED_RESTART
data.value: In order to modify the new addons configuration, the program needs to be restarted. Is it OK to restart now ?

data.name: TXT_ADDONS_NOT_CHANGED
data.value: Since you have canceled the restart, your add-on configuration will not be changed.

data.name: TXT_ADDONSETTINGS
data.value: Enabled Addons

data.name: TXT_ADDONSLIST
data.value: Checked addons are currently enabled. Use the checkboxes to enable/disable addons. Addons marked with * are required and cannot be disabled. A program restart will be needed to apply the new addons configuration.

data.name: TXT_ADDONSLIST_NORESTART
data.value: Checked addons are currently enabled. Use the checkboxes to enable/disable addons. Addons marked with * are required and cannot be disabled.

data.name: TXT_CANT_INSTALL_BUILTIN
data.value:
The addon library you have selected cannot be installed, because it is a built-in library.
If you intend to enable/disable the addons from the built-in library, please use the addons checkboxes.

data.name: TXT_CANT_UNINSTALL_BUILTIN
data.value:
The addon library you have specified cannot be uninstalled, because it is a built-in library.
If you intend to enable/disable the addons from the built-in library, please use the addons checkboxes.

data.name: TXT_INVALID_NAME
data.value:
The DLL file you have selected is not a valid OPMedia extension library.
A valid OPMedia extension library file name should follow the convention: <Library-Name>Extension.dll.

data.name: TXT_NAV_ADDONS
data.value: Navigation

data.name: TXT_PREVIEW_ADDONS
data.value: Preview / Visualization

data.name: TXT_PROP_ADDONS
data.value: File Property Interaction

data.name: TXT_SHAREDADDONS
TXT_NO_NAV_ADDONS
data.value: No navigation addons are currently configured. The application cannot run without them. You must to select and enable at least one navigation addon in order to continue.

data.name: TXT_NOTIFY_NON_PREVIEW
data.value: The selected item cannot be previewed. You must use an external program to view it.

data.name: TXT_NOTIFY_PREVIEW
data.value: To preview the selected item, double click it or press Enter.

data.name: TXT_PREPARE_PREVIEW
data.value: Automatic preview of selected item is starting in a couple of seconds. Press Escape to cancel ...

data.name: TXT_PREVIEW_CANCELED
data.value: Automatic preview of selected item has been canceled. Select another item or press Enter to preview the current item.

data.name: TXT_SELECTALLADDONS
data.value: Select all addons

data.name: TXT_UNINSTALL_ADDONLIB
data.value: Uninstall addon library...
